dutchsentence: Tien procent van de studenten was afwezig.
englishtranslate: Ten percent of the students were absent.

dutchsentence: Heb je die nieuwe film al gezien in de bioscoop?
englishtranslate: Have you seen that new film in the cinema yet?

dutchsentence: De video over de vogels was erg informatief.
englishtranslate: The video about the birds was very informative.

dutchsentence: Het was een heel warme dag.
englishtranslate: It was a very warm day.

dutchsentence: Ze kreeg een speciaal cadeau voor haar verjaardag.
englishtranslate: She received a special gift for her birthday.

dutchsentence: Pardon, zou u dat alstublieft willen herhalen?
englishtranslate: Pardon, would you please repeat that?

dutchsentence: Excuseer, mag ik er even langs?
englishtranslate: Excuse me, may I pass through?

dutchsentence: Maak je geen zorgen, er is niks aan de hand.
englishtranslate: Don't worry, there's nothing going on (nothing is wrong).
